summary: Implements a coverage.py plugin that parses generated C files from Cython, extracts embedded source‑line comments and trace calls, maps them back to the original Python/Cython files (including .pyx, .pxd, .pxi), and reports line execution data to the coverage engine, handling multi‑file modules and exclusion markers.
business_intent: Enable precise line‑coverage measurement for Cython extensions by linking compiled C code back to the original source files, allowing developers to assess test coverage of Cython projects within the standard coverage.py workflow.
